Title: Provides coverage for a cranial prosthesis under certain conditions
Summary: Provides coverage for a cranial prosthesis under certain conditions; defines a cranial prosthesis as a wig or hairpiece.
LawCode: Amd §365-a, Soc Serv L; amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the insurance law, in relation to coverage for a cranial prosthesis
